title: Header - User name and department
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has logged into the site
custom_expected:
THEN user's name appears in the upper left corner
AND user's department name appears below it

AND WHEN user clicks on the department name
THEN page redirects to the correct department Home page.

title: Header breadcrumb - Inside MLB
custom_preconds: GIVEN that breadcrumb appears in the header
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Inside MLB in the breadcrumb
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to the main page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19815)

title: Top Nav - Events button - function
custom_preconds: GIVEN that top nav is visible in the header
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the Events button
AND user clicks on an event
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to that event's page

AND WHEN user clicks on "show more"
THEN user is redirected to the Global Events page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19817)

title: Top Nav - Spaces button - function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that top nav is visible in the header
AND user clicks on the Spaces button
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a space in the dropdown menu
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to that space's page

AND WHEN user clicks on "show more"
THEN user is redirected to a list of spaces.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19818)

title: Header nav button open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that header has appeared
AND nav button has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN nav is open
custom_expected:
THEN button looks like the photo below

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19833)

title: Header nav button close
custom_preconds: GIVEN that nav button has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN nav is closed
custom_expected:
THEN button looks like photo below

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19834)

title: Calendar view buttons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Calendar page
AND three buttons have appeared in the header on the right side of the screen: Day, Week, Month
custom_steps: WHEN user taps or clicks on one of those buttons
custom_expected: THEN the calendar display changes according to the selection

title: Calendar nav buttons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Calendar page
AND 3 buttons have appeared to the left in the header: left arrow, Today, right arrow
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on any of those 3 buttons
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar navigates appropriately:
left arrow shows previous days
right arrow shows future days
Today shows right now

title: Calendar: select event
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the Global Calendar
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the title of an event
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the selected event's individual page

title: Event page - appearance for non-Owners
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user was on the Global Events page
custom_steps:
WHEN user selected an event
AND user was not the originator of that event
AND the event's page appeared
custom_expected:
THEN user will see the "I will attend" button
AND user will not see the Edit button 
AND user will not see the Delete button
AND user will not see Attendees or Codes in the side nav

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19858)

title: Global Events - change view - default
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the Global Events page
custom_expected:
THEN the table and grid buttons appear at the top of the page
AND the page shows a grid of event boxes by default.

(The image shows the Archive tab but the All tab looks the same when it's populated.)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19859)

title: Global Events - table view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Events page
AND the grid of event boxes appears
AND the table and grid buttons appear at the top of the page
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks or taps on the table button
custom_expected:
THEN the grid disappears
AND a table appears
AND it looks like the photo below

(the image shows the Archive tab but the All tab looks the same when it's populated)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19860)

title: Global Events - table view - sort
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Events page
AND user selects the table button 
AND the table view of events appears
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on any column header (except Location)
custom_expected:
THEN the events change order, with the rows sorted alphabetically or numerically by the data in that selected column
AND clicking on the column header a second time reverses the sorting.

title: Global Events - select event from table
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Events page
AND user has selected the table view
AND all the events appear in the table
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks or taps on an event name
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to that event's individual page.

title: Global Events - select event from grid
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Events page
AND event boxes appear in a grid
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a white label / Event title in an event box
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the individual event page that matches the label selected

title: Dept Wiki - non-members don't have access
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is NOT a member of a specific Department
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to that Department's Wiki page
custom_expected: THEN user sees a popup stating that they don't have the permissions to view the Wiki.

title: Dept Wiki - breadcrumb
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Department's Wiki page
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the department name in the breadcrumb
custom_expected: THEN page redirects to the department's home page.

title: Dept Wiki - search
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Department's Wiki page
custom_steps:
WHEN user types in the Search field
AND user hits Enter/Return
custom_expected:
THEN page presents the search results that match the typed phrase
AND the results look like the photo below
AND user can click on a result
AND page will redirect to the relevant wiki page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19944)

title: Space Home page - nav select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on any page within a Space
AND the nav is visible
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on each nav element
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab
AND the new page corresponds to the nav element that was selected

(Test all nav elements)

title: Space Home - Message Board section - select View link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Home page
AND Latest Message Board Posts section has loaded
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on "View all posts" link
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Space Message Board page.

title: Space Home - Members section - select members link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Members section has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the "View all members" link
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Space Members page

title: Space Home - Latest Blog Posts - select View all
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Home page
AND Latest Blog Posts section has loaded
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on "View all blog posts" link
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Space's Blog page.

title: Space Home - Documents section - select View link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Home page
AND Latest Documents section has loaded
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on "View all documents" link
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Space's Documents page.

title: Space Home - Latest Message Board Posts - select message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Home page
AND the Latest Message Board Posts section has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a message title
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the message thread that matches the title selected.

title: Space Home - Latest Blog Posts - select post
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Home page
AND the Latest Blog Posts section has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a blog post title
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the blog post page that matches the title selected.

title: Space Home - Documents section - select document
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Home page
AND the Documents section has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a document title
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the document page that matches the title selected.
